Value returning method:
package cs;

public class Welcome {
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	int i = 34, j = 45, k = max(i, j);
	System.out.println("The maximum number between " + i + " and " + j + " is : " + k);
	}
	public static int max(int num1, int num2) {
	int result;
	if (num1 > num2)
		result = num1;
		else
			result = num2;
	return result;
	
	}
}

Void method:
package cs;

public class Welcome {
	
	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
	int i = 304, j = 45;
	printmax(i, j);
	}
	public static void printmax(int num1, int num2) {
	int result;
	if (num1 > num2)
		result = num1;
		else
			result = num2;
	System.out.println("The maximum number between " +num1+ " and " +num2+ " is : " +result);
	
	}
}
